message: With TagList, you can `ctrl+]` to go to a function's source (decleration). However, TagList only generates a tag list for the current project. If I want to go to an external module's source (e.g. `os.path.mkdir(..)`), I can't! How can I do that?
Read up on :help tags and it will explain how to point vim at a tag definition file other than the one generated by TagList; it should work pretty well for you!
